description: Mapping from the ordering by sum to the ordering by product of the ordered pairs. Inverse permutation to A056534.
comments: The last term of the each row r of the triangle is the first term of that row + (tau(r)-1).As an array, T(n,k) is the index of the k-th term of A027750 whose value is n. - _Michel Marcus_, Oct 15 2015
links: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
maple: Maple procedure nthmember given in A054426.
mathematica: a[n_] := If[p = Position[A056534, n]; p != {}, p[[1, 1]], 0]; (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Aug 20 2013 *)
crossrefs: Left edge: A054519, Right edge: A006218.
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 20 2000
